did.unittitle: Keogh (1983) - (contains the Amalgamated Song Book and 8 photographs
Standard-Times - New Bedford, Mass. (Friday, August 18, 1967) - also contains 5 photographs
Tenth Biennial Convention of the AMCWA (1930-1934)
Proceedings and Executive Council Reports of the AFL-CIO (Nov. 15-20, 1979)
ILGWU Clippings - Scrapbook on the ILG Fight, 1947, collected by Abraham D. Chatman, Manager of the Rochester Joint Board, Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America

Scrapbook of clippings covering the period from the early 1930's to 1951 and chiefly devoted to the activities of the Rochester Joint Board, Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America collected by Abraham D. Chatman, Manager of the Rochester Joint Board
